text: Suliman-Marlon Mustapha (born 24 May 2001) is an Austrian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Italian club Como. ==Career== He started his career with Nu√üdorfer AC and Red Star Penzing in Vienna. Then he went to the Red Bull Salzburg Academy U18. 2018 he played for Mainz 05 II. In 2021, Mustapha was sent on loan to Austrian side Admira Wacker from Mainz 05 in the German Bundesliga. On 24 July 2021, he debuted for Admira during a 1-1 draw with WSG Tirol. ==International== Mustapha debuted in October 2018 versus Switzerland in the U18 team, in October 2019 he played the first time for the U19 team versus Wales, in October 2021 he debuted for the U21 versus Estonia.Transfermarkt.at Marlon Mustapha Nationalteam (German) ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Austrian football forwards
title: Marlon Mustapha
